column1: Some  of the grounds  of  appeal  urged  by  the  appellant are;  that
the learned High Court Judge was gravely prejudiced in the conduct of
the  case,  therefore  erred in  interpreting the  application  of section  165
of the Evidence Ordinance; evidence of PW 5  has been wrongly excluded
and  thereby  the  identity  of  the  appellant  has  not  been  established  ;
there  are  factual  errors in  the judgment;  in  any  event the  sentence is
